story_teamgalactic_02_12000/2401_1201_01:
Merci! Everyone on Pasio is awake now, thanks
to you!
story_teamgalactic_02_12000/2401_1201_03:
I hope it’s because Cyrus has begun to understand
how important feelings are.
story_teamgalactic_02_12000/2401_1201_04:
Yeah. He even seemed concerned about Dialga
a bit, in the end!
story_teamgalactic_02_12000/2401_1201_05: He’s gonna change—I’m sure of it!
story_teamgalactic_02_12000/2401_1201_06:
I felt an immeasurable amount of despair from him
in Darkrai’s nightmare...
story_teamgalactic_02_12000/2401_1201_07:
But despite that, he’s trying to take a step in the
right direction.
story_teamgalactic_02_12000/2401_1201_08: It’s because he has people he cares about.
story_teamgalactic_02_12000/2401_1201_09:
Seems we should keep an eye on him, just
in case.
story_teamgalactic_02_12000/2401_1201_10: That said, you all did a marvelous job!
story_teamgalactic_02_12000/2401_1201_12:
I hope I can have another battle with Team
Galactic someday...
story_teamgalactic_02_12000/2401_1201_13: Not as enemies, but as rivals!
